alert.note: Alert for Allen (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:04PM CST until January 11 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Oberlin. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 13.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River Oberlin 13.0 13.0 Mon 7 pm CST 12.9 12.0 10.9 &&
